attachments.title: liampauling/betfair
attachments.text: Lightweight python wrapper for Betfair API-NG (with streaming) - liampauling/betfair

text:
<https://docs.developer.betfair.com/display/1smk3cen4v3lu3yomq5qye0ni/placeOrders>

> As currently LIMIT bets where the backer’s stake is at and above the ‘Min Bet Size’ for the currency concerned (£2 for GBP) are valid.  In addition, bets below this value are valid if the payout of the bet would be equal to or greater than the value of ‘*Min Bet Payout’* - £10 for GBP. For example, a bet of £1 @ 10, or 10p @ 100 or 1p @ 1000 are all valid as they all target a payout of £10 or more.

elements.text: As currently LIMIT bets where the backer’s stake is at and above the ‘Min Bet Size’ for the currency concerned (£2 for GBP) are valid.  In addition, bets below this value are valid if the payout of the bet would be equal to or greater than the value of ‘
Min Bet Payout’
- £10 for GBP. For example, a bet of £1 @ 10, or 10p @ 100 or 1p @ 1000 are all valid as they all target a payout of £10 or more.
